name: cv
description: * photo * typescript checker * pure native API, no framework * use SCSS * theme switch (light\black) * Language switcher (ENG\RU) * GitHub repo as the only source of truth with scheduled auto update * Mobile version * print version

scripts.build:pdf:eng: mkdir -p pdf && resume export --resume ./resume/eng.json --theme kendall --format pdf pdf/resume.eng.pdf
scripts.build:pdf:rus: mkdir -p pdf && resume export --resume ./resume/rus.json --theme kendall --format pdf pdf/resume.rus.pdf
scripts.build:pdf: npm run build:pdf:eng && npm run build:pdf:rus
